languages.text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Ну а ты, дитя теней? Смотришь на меня так, словно боишься дышать одним воздухом. Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Ну а ты, дитя теней? Смотришь на меня так, словно боишься дышать одним воздухом. Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепещать от ужаса и молить о прощении".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Ну а ты, дитя теней? Смотришь на меня так, словно боишься дышать одним воздухом. Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble with fear and beg for forgiveness."

You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Y tú, hijo de las sombras? Me miras como si tuvieras miedo de respirar el mismo aire que yo. Eso es bueno. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Y tú, hijo de las sombras? Me miras como si tuvieras miedo de respirar el mismo aire que yo. Eso es bueno. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇に不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「どうした、影の子よ。まるで私と同じ空気を吸うのも怖いような顔つきをしているな。いいことだ。お前の陰謀団が我が血族にしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇に不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「どうした、影の子よ。まるで私と同じ空気を吸うのも怖いような顔つきをしているな。いいことだ。お前の陰謀団が我が血族にしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇上咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“那你呢，暗影之子？你看着我的目光，就好像害怕与我呼吸同样的空气一样。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇上咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“那你呢，暗影之子？你看着我的目光，就好像害怕与我呼吸同样的空气一样。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Et vous, enfant de l'ombre ? Vous me regardez comme si vous aviez peur de respirer le même air que moi. C'est une bonne chose. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Et vous, enfant de l'ombre ? Vous me regardez comme si vous aviez peur de respirer le même air que moi. C'est une bonne chose. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Und Ihr, Kind der Schatten? Ihr schaut mich an, als hättet Ihr Angst, dieselbe Luft wie ich zu atmen. Das ist gut. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Und Ihr, Kind der Schatten? Ihr schaut mich an, als hättet Ihr Angst, dieselbe Luft wie ich zu atmen. Das ist gut. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamaz bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Peki sana ne demeli gölgelerin çocuğu? Âdeta aynı havayı solumamızdan bile korkar gibi bakıyorsun. Güzel. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korkudan titreyip af dilemelisin."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "And you, child of the shadows? You look at me as if you are afraid to breathe the same air as me. That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamayan bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Peki sana ne demeli gölgelerin çocuğu? Bana âdeta aynı havayı solumamızdan bile korkar gibi bakıyorsun. Güzel. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korku içinde titreyip af dilenmen gerek."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
